title: 1972 BMW 3.0CSi 5-Speed
description: This 1972 BMW 3.0CSi is a European-market example that was sold new in April 1972 by Garage De L’Aviation of Geneva, Switzerland. Chassis 2261996 was refreshed in July 2022 by BMW Group Classic in Germany before being imported to the US and sold on BaT in July 2023. Acquired by the selling dealer in 2024, the car is finished in Ceylon Gold over beige fabric and black vinyl upholstery and is powered by a fuel-injected 3.0L inline-six mated to a retrofitted five-speed manual transmission. Additional equipment includes a limited-slip differential, four-wheel disc brakes, and 16” Alpina wheels along with wood interior trim, a Blaupunkt AM/FM cassette stereo, and electric windows. This 3.0CSi is now offered as part of DriverSource’s 2024 Oktmotorfest Collection with manufacturer’s literature, a stamped service booklet, records from the 2022 refresh, tools, and a clean California title.
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Bid for the chance to own a 1972 BMW 3.0CSi 5-Speed at auction with Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online. Lot #168,466.
